"'Complicated'" is a song by Barbadian recording artist Rihanna from her fifth
studio album [[Loud (Rihanna album)|Loud]] (2010). It was written and produced
by Tricky Stewart and Ester Dean. "Complicated" is a dance-pop, hip hop and
trance music song, which also displays elements of pop, dance-pop and R&B. It
contains lyrical content explaining how two people in a relationship can find
one another complicated at times. Critical reception of the song was generally
positive, as the majority of reviewers concluded that it was one of the best
tracks to be included on Loud. Reviewers also praised Rihanna's vocal
performance in the song. Upon the release of the album in November 2010, the
song charted at number 50 on the South Korea Gaon International Chart.
